stages.title: Define Your Environmental Science Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in conservation, climate science, sustainability, or environmental policy, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top environmental science programs value strong science foundations, environmental passion, and commitment to sustainability.
checklist: Research 5-7 top programs (Stanford, UC Berkeley, Cambridge, Wageningen, NUS)
Identify your interest (conservation, climate, sustainability, policy, ecology)
Assess your biology, chemistry, and math preparation
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting environmental work, academics, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, research, and environmental activism.
checklist: Research reach, target, and safety schools
Note AP Environmental Science and Biology requirements
Plan your Common App personal statement theme
Identify environmental research or activism opportunities

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, research, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for Cambridge, Imperial, etc.

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards.
checklist: Review environmental topics in national exams
Document interest in specific environmental fields

quiz.q: What do top environmental science programs value most?

stages.title: Gain Environmental Research & Activism Experience
stages.description: Develop environmental skills through research, conservation work, or sustainability projects.

Global.overview: Demonstrate environmental commitment through research, conservation, or sustainability projects.
checklist: Participate in environmental research or field work
Start or join environmental clubs or initiatives
Document your environmental work and impact
projectIdeas: Conduct local environmental research or monitoring
Start a sustainability initiative at school
Volunteer with conservation or environmental groups

US.overview: Link environmental work to research programs and applications.

UK.overview: Integrate environmental work into EPQ or UCAS.
checklist: Draft EPQ proposal on environmental topic

Asia.overview: Use environmental work to build portfolios.

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate environmental commitment?
opts: Environmental research, conservation work, and sustainability projects
quiz.correct: Environmental research, conservation work, and sustainability projects

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in biology, chemistry, and mathematics.

Global.overview: Strong science preparation is essential for environmental science.
checklist: Master biology, chemistry, and earth science
Complete AP Environmental Science and AP Biology
Achieve A* in A-level Biology and Chemistry

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for environmental science?
opts: Biology, chemistry, earth science, and mathematics
quiz.correct: Biology, chemistry, earth science, and mathematics

stages.title: Craft Your Environmental Science Narrative
stages.description: Translate your environmental work and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your environmental passion, research, and achievements.
checklist: Get feedback from teachers or mentors
Draft Common App essay with environmental focus
Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App
Draft reflection on environmental career goals

quiz.q: What should your environmental science statement highlight?
opts: Environmental passion, research, and commitment to sustainability
quiz.correct: Environmental passion, research, and commitment to sustainability

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

quiz.q: What's key for environmental science interviews?
opts: Clear explanation of research and environmental passion
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of research and environmental passion
